author: Tim Higgins
title: Arizonans Rethink the Self-Driving Experiment They Invited
text:
TEMPE, Ariz.â€”When self-driving test cars from Uber Technologies Inc. started showing up on the streets here early last year, many in the community greeted them with fascination and a certain pride.
Residents posted photos on social media of themselves spotting the vehicles in public, and many say they felt the testing showed that the Phoenix suburb was embracing innovation. 

After... RELATED VIDEO Experts Break Down the Self-Driving Uber Crash The Tempe, Ariz., police released a video of the fatal accident involving a pedestrian and an Uber self-driving vehicle. We asked experts to analyze the footage and explain what factors may have caused systems to fail. Photo: National Transportation Safety Board
